description:
“Bitcoin for Beginners” is the new Udemy Video Training Series designed to help anyone who wants to know more about “The Future of Money”, but needs someone to show them how it works in the real world, and do it in simple language anyone can understand. Whether it is used as a store of value, an investment, for sending money worldwide for virtually nothing, or for those just looking to experience the latest in global financial technology, Bitcoin has something for everyone. This will take someone who has no knowledge of Bitcoinand bring them a solid understanding of what it is and why it is here to stay, and a worthwhile investment in your future.

This Free Version of "Bitcoin for Beginners" gives you a basic understanding of how Bitcoin works, and gets you ready for more advanced training in the 20-Video Udemy Training series. The full version also includes the eBook "Bitcoin Bonanza - Why You Need to Get Bitcoin Now", plus Volume 1 of the Bitcoin Bonanza Newsletter, which shows you how Bitcoin has become a global phenomenon.

Here you will learn:

  • Who Evander Smart is, and why his background on Wall Street helps him teach the benefits of using Bitcoin
  • How the current global monetary policy works, and how it is destined to collapse on a grander scale, following many mini-collapses that have already happened recently.
  • How Bitcoin is modeled after the growth and design of The Internet, and how this model of success will change "The Future of Money"
  • How PayPal is a future victim of the design advantages of Bitcoin, and how PayPal joining forces with Bitcoin may only delay the inevitable
  • How Bitcoin is made, and how it has a record of security fiat (paper) currency only dreams of.
  • How Bitcoin is transitioning to a global currency, and the growing pains that go along with that growth.
  • How adding major endorsements and partnership with mega-corporations like Microsoft, Dell, Wikipedia and PayPal hurts Bitcoin's value in the short-term, and how they strengthen it long-term.
title: "Bitcoin For Beginners" - Using Bitcoin & Altcoins
